question: Is there any hadith mentioning about a very big war before the arrival of Imam Mahdi?
answer:
QUESTION
I came to know that there will be a very big war before Imam Mahdi takes power. This war will lead to a whole distruction of the computer era. This is explained, as it is said in many hadith that swords will be used as weaopons in the last wars. So present situation of world has to change.Can you explain please. Jazakallah Khair.
ANSWER


Share:
There will be many wars taking place before the era of Imaam Mahdi.%0D%0AHereunder is one Hadith pertaining to that:%0D%0AHadhrat Umm Salma (Radhiallaahu Anha) reports that the blessed Rasul%0D%0A(Sallallaahu Alayhi Wasallam) said, 'There will be differences at the time%0D%0Aof the death of a Khalifah. Then a man of the inhabitants of Madinah will%0D%0Aflee to Makkah Mukarramah. Some people will come to him and take him out%0D%0Athough he will be unwilling. Then, they will pledge allegiance to him%0D%0Abetween the corners of Ka'bah (Hajar-e-Aswad) and Maqaame-e-Ebraahim. An%0D%0AArmy from Syria will be sent to fight him (Mahdi). They will sink to the%0D%0Aground in an open plain ground between Makkah Mukarramah and Madinah%0D%0AMunawwarah. When this will happen, the eminent saints of Syria and Iraq will%0D%0A%0Acome and take allegiance to him. Imaam Mahdi will distribute the wealth. He%0D%0Awill then govern the people according to the ways of Shari'ah and establish%0D%0AIslam on earth. He will live for seven years and then die and the Muslims%0D%0Awill perform his Janaaza.' (Abu Dawood pg.589)%0D%0A%0D%0Aand Allah Ta'ala Knows Best%0D%0A%0D%0AMufti Ebrahim Desai%0D%0AFATWA DEPT.
